attributes.action: Make Public the Railway Systems TRUST + TOP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Government to review the systems TRUST + TOP's at the moment these are only avaliable in Railway stations but not to the public or train enthusiasts. These systems would come in use to plain enthusiast who wishes to photo a Loco and dosent know where it is so they use TOP's to find it, Or the general passenger who wants to see how well there train is running - TRUST Gives a much better detail on how the train is running than any other system.
